header.discount: Get up to 17% discount when shopping on our website

modal.title: Contact Us
modal.text: Ask our specialists in the way most convenient for you:

wishes.title: My Wishlist
wishes.click-like: Click the ♡ icon on a product. Log in to your account, and all favorites will be saved.

basket.add-product: Start with collections on the homepage or find the desired product using search
basket.title: Your Cart
basket.delivery-duration: The product will be delivered within 24 hours.

orders.dont-any-1: You have no orders! Use the search to find all you need!

newPass.pattern: Enter at least 1 number and 1 letter

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.delivery-info: We will send order updates to your provided phone number. The courier will contact you to confirm the delivery time.
checkout.bts: Delivery to regions outside Tashkent city is carried out via postal service BTS. This service ensures fast and reliable delivery. If you have any questions or need additional information, feel free to contact us!

map.title: Where should we deliver your order?
map.choose-map: Select the delivery address on the map
map.delivery-comment: Any information that can help the courier, e.g., 'opposite the pharmacy, near the coffee shop'

section1.title: FRUTEACORP
section1.line1: FRUTEACORP is a family-owned business established in 2019 with a mission to redefine tea traditions and offer the people of Uzbekistan a selection of unique flavors. We aim to bring the art of tea into every home by introducing all-natural fruit and berry blends crafted from original recipes using the finest ingredients sourced from around the globe.
section1.line2: Our products are a choice for high quality, natural ingredients, and respect for traditions. We believe that tea is more than just a beverage. It is a harmony of taste, care for people and their health, and a source of inspiration. That is why our slogan is “FRUTEACORP — your choice of natural and quality”.

section2.title: Our Product Line
section2.line1: FRUTEACORP offers a wide range of tea products tailored to various preferences and needs. Our portfolio includes loose tea blends, tea bags, and private-label (PL) products. We cater to both retail and corporate clients, taking a personalized approach to every order. Additionally, we actively collaborate with the HoReCa sector, providing solutions that meet the specific requirements of this market.
section2.line2: Unique recipes, thoughtful packaging, and meticulous attention to detail make our products the perfect choice for everyday use as well as special occasions. With every cup of tea from FRUTEACORP, we strive to deliver joy, inspiration, and comfort while opening up a world of rich flavors and aromas.

section3.title: Quality and Exclusivity
section3.line1: We place great emphasis on the quality and natural origins of our teas. All ingredients for our blends are imported from various corners of the world and undergo rigorous quality control. The unique recipes and flavor combinations make our teas truly exclusive — you won’t find anything like them elsewhere.
section3.line2: FRUTEACORP teas are designed for those who value high quality and originality. They are ideal for family tea times, as a sophisticated gift, or as a special treat. Our products are especially appreciated by gourmets, corporate clients, and partners in the HoReCa segment.

section4.title: Our Achievements and Plans
section4.line1: We are proud to count the largest retail chains in Uzbekistan among our loyal customers. We are also actively developing our export operations, supplying our products to both neighboring and distant countries, and steadily expanding our presence in global markets.
section4.line2: With the FRUTEABAR brand, we aim to offer not just tea but an opportunity to enjoy a wealth of flavors while immersing yourself in the natural essence and aesthetics of tea.
section4.line3: FRUTEABAR: Enjoy the variety of flavors.
